subject: RE: donation report all donations
preview: Hi Joel,    We've found the sollution (thanks Rosa). So you can ignore my last email.    Have a good day!    Joan

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,



We've found the sollution (thanks Rosa). So you can ignore my last email.



Have a good day!



Joan

Hi Joel,





Thank you! The report now shows all donations. But we've encountered another problem. The report downloads as an Xcel sheet, all the data per donor is locked in one cel. Meaning we can't add filters and/or extract the email adresses >>>>See attachment.

Is it possible to have all info (name/surname/email/address/amount..etc.) in seperate cells so we can use this data for KGTMS promo?

Or is there an Excel trick I don't know about to seperate it into seperate cells…



Hope you can help!



Have a great day!



Joan

Hi Rosa,

Sure, can you please try it again? we have updated date formats for it to work properly. 

I've attached a sample downloaded csv. 

Let me know if this works?
@heath All good now on this one. There's just a mixed up with the date format and post data.

@joel on this page: https://kissgoodbyetoms.nl/wp-admin/edit.php?post_type=donation&page=donation_reports

The search function is working e.g. from this date to that date. But when you click the download CSV button it's defaulting to the current month only. Can you please investigate? Thanks,

Hi Heath,



Thank you for the report and the video. I did the same thing as in the video but the report you sent me actually has the same problem as we do, it's an export only of the donations in May. We need a report from all the donations done so far and for some reason it doesn't show in the export..





Kind regards,



Rosa Douw

Communicatie & Projecten

2253 JJ Voorschoten



Postbus 200

2250 AE Voorschoten

T 071 - 5 600 500

T 071 - 5 600 506 (direct)

Help mee het milieu te beschermen. Denk daar alstublieft even aan voordat u dit bericht afdrukt. Hartelijk dank.

Hi Rosa, 

I have attached the report and please see this video instructions on how to download it: https://www.loom.com/share/c2ed7065e3eb4078a8c32c0633211c0c (hopefully it helps?)

Hi Heath,

If this takes some time is it maybe possible for you to send us an export of the donations in the meantime?

Thanks again!


Met vriendelijke groet,

Rosa Douw
Communicatie & Projecten

From: MS Research J. Bergmans <assistentcommunicatie@msresearch.nl>
Date: dinsdag 7 mei 2019 10:47
To: MS Research R. Douw <projecten@msresearch.nl>; 'Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ' <heath@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: RE: donation report all donations

Hi Heath,

We have discovered that the shortlist of 93 donations are the ones from the month MAY only. As we cant change to calender (its set on May only) we cant download a full export. Our first donations started in February.
I think thats what causing the problem.

Would you guys be able to adjust the calender set-up?

Thank you!



Met vriendelijke groet,

Joan Bergmans

Assistent communicatie

I’m trying to make a donation report of all donations so far but everytime I download the report it only show 93 of the 343 donations.. Can you help me out?
